~~~~w
Post.title: Raspberry  Minecraft
Post._content:
## 

IP Raspberry Pi minecraft server 

<!-- more -->
## 

### 

 Raspberry Pi 4B 4GB  Raspbian Buster Lite 3GB  raspberry  32bit  3GB2GB

[Raspbian Buster Lite ](https://www.raspberrypi.org/downloads/raspbian/)

 [balenaEtcher](https://www.balena.io/etcher/) 

{% asset_img  balenaEtcher.png %}

 boot  ssh  Notepad++ 


 IP  [](https://iqmore.tw/cht-hinet-alcatel-i-040gw-login)
IP: 192.168.1.1

SSH  [Putty](https://www.putty.org/) 
 Yes 
: pi : raspberry

 
```bash
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get upgrade
```

###  Java 

 Open JDK 
```bash
sudo apt install default-jdk
```

 Java 
```bash
java -version
```

###  Screen

Screen  SSH 
```bash
sudo apt-get install screen
```

###  Minecraft Server 

 Spigot  Server 

####  (minecraft  )
```bash
cd /home/pi
mkdir minecraft
cd minecraft
```

#### 
```bash
wget https://hub.spigotmc.org/jenkins/job/BuildTools/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/target/BuildTools.jar
```

####  

PS: 1.15.1 minecraft

```bash
sudo java -jar BuildTools.jar --rev 1.15.1
```

## Run Your Server !

### 
 1.15.1 
Xms  Java 
Xmx  Java   Raspberry Pi 32 2GB 
```bash
sudo java -Xms512M -Xmx2048M -jar /home/pi/minecraft/spigot-1.15.1.jar nogui
```

 EULA 
```bash
sudo nano eula.txt
```

 eula  true  Ctrl + O Ctrl + X 
 Server
```bash
sudo java -Xms512M -Xmx2048M -jar /home/pi/minecraft/spigot-1.15.1.jar nogui
```

### 

```bash
sudo nano server.properties
```

### 


```bash
mkdir /home/pi/startup
cd /home/pi/startup
nano minecraft.sh
```


```bash
#!/bin/bash
cd /home/pi/minecraft/ && java -Xms512M -Xmx2048M -jar /home/pi/minecraft/spigot-1.15.1.jar nogui
```


```bash
chmod +x minecraft.sh
```


```bash
screen        # Enter
sudo /home/pi/startup/minecraft.sh
```

 Minecraft  Raspberry  IP

###  Minecraft Server 

 Spigot  Server 

####  (minecraft  )
```bash
cd /home/pi
mkdir minecraft
cd minecraft
```

#### 
```bash
wget https://hub.spigotmc.org/jenkins/job/BuildTools/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/target/BuildTools.jar
```

####  

PS: 1.15.1 minecraft

```bash
sudo java -jar BuildTools.jar --rev 1.15.1
```

## Run Your Server !

### 
 1.15.1 
Xms  Java 
Xmx  Java   Raspberry Pi 32 2GB 
```bash
sudo java -Xms512M -Xmx2048M -jar /home/pi/minecraft/spigot-1.15.1.jar nogui
```

 EULA

sudo nano eula.txt
```

 eula  true  Ctrl + O Ctrl + X 
 Server
```bash
sudo java -Xms512M -Xmx2048M -jar /home/pi/minecraft/spigot-1.15.1.jar nogui

### 

```bash
sudo nano server.properties
```

### 


```bash
mkdir /home/pi/startup
cd /home/pi/startup
nano minecraft.sh
```


```bash
#!/bin/bash
cd /home/pi/minecraft/ && java -Xms512M -Xmx2048M -jar /home/pi/minecraft/spigot-1.15.1.jar nogui
```


```bash
chmod +x minecraft.sh
```


```bash
screen        # Enter
sudo /home/pi/startup/minecraft.sh
~~~~
